history.proof: intros n m x. induction n. - simpl. sfirstorder depth: 3. - simpl. scongruence use: mult_assoc_reverse.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n m x. induction n. - simpl. rewrite Nat.add_0_l. simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHn. rewrite plus_minus_lemma1. rewrite <- mult_acc_aux. rewrite <- power_mult_lemma1. reflexivity.
